name: 2023 The 5th International Conference on Video, Signal and Image Processing
content: Publication: Accepted papers of VSIP 2023 after proper registration and presentation will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. (\*All the previous Conference Proceedings have been archived in ACM Digital Library and have been indexed by Ei Compendex & Scopus.)
